transcript: there's going to be a lot of Conor people that wear shirts that say you matter I don't agree and I think by thinking that way you set yourself up to be upset at the world it sets an expectation that we are bound to not see fulfilled and so if you see suffering as unmet expectations you can either change the conditions or you can change the expectations and one of them happens in your mind and the other one forces the entire world to change and the crazy thing is people will demand that a universe who doesn't know the exist or care change to their will which it won't
